title: Motion of two particles from position functions part - c

content.question: Find the acceleration of particle P at time t=3. Is particle P speeding up, slowing down, or doing neither at time t=3? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Find the acceleration of particle P at time t=3. Is particle P speeding up, slowing down, or doing neither at time t=3? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 4.2: Straight-Line Motion - Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
